ðŸ“– Summary: Lightpanda Browser is an open-source, headless browser designed for AI and automation tasks. It emphasizes fast execution, low memory footprint, and compatibility with tools like Playwright and Puppeteer through the Chrome DevTools Protocol (CDP). It's intended for use cases such as AI agent development, LLM training, web scraping, and testing.
